## Introduction
Do celltype annotation.

```{r}
library(Seurat)
library(tidyverse)
library(SingleR)
library(patchwork)
library(circlize)
library(ComplexHeatmap)
library(here)
library(SingleCellExperiment)
source(here("plot_theme.R"))
source(here("helper_functions.R"))
set.seed(123)
```

## Automatic cell type labeling

```{r}
# load integrated CphRNAi dataset.
CphRNAi <- readRDS(here("output", "CphRNAi_seurat_integrated.rds"))

# currated table of marker genes based on the literature such as https://www.pnas.org/doi/10.1073/pnas.1916820117 or https://www.science.org/doi/10.1126/science.abk2432 or
# https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2211124715006075
marker_table <- data.frame(gene=c("betaTry", "epsilonTry", "alphaTry", 
                             "nub", "Myo31DF",
                             "esg", "N", "E(spl)mbeta-HLH", "klu",
                             "Dl",
                             "Vha100-4", "Vha16-1", "MtnC", "CG17109",
                             "pros", "7B2", "IA-2", 
                             "PGRP-SC1a", "PGRP-SC1b","Jon65Ai", "Jon65Aii", "Jon66Ci", "Jon66Cii",
                             "lambdaTry", "LManVI", "iotaTry", "etaTry", "zetaTry", 
                             "thetaTry", "Npc2f",
                             "Smvt","ct"),
                      celltype=c("aEC", "aEC", "aEC", 
                                 "dEC", "dEC", 
                                 "EB", "EB", "EB", "EB", 
                                 "ISC",
                                 "Copper\ncells", "Copper\ncells", "Copper\ncells", "Copper\ncells", 
                                 "EE", "EE", "EE", 
                                 "LFC", "LFC", "LFC", "LFC", "LFC", "LFC", "LFC",
                                 "pEC","pEC","pEC","pEC",
                                 "mEC", "mEC",
                                 "MT","MT"))


Idents(CphRNAi) <- factor(CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3, levels = as.character(0:25))
p<-marker_heatmap(seurat = CphRNAi,
               markers = marker_table$gene,
               celltype = marker_table$celltype,
               group.by = "integrated_snn_res.1.3",
               cap_value = 3)
p

# based on the heatmap  assign the labels
# really hard to specifically pick out an ISC cluster.
CphRNAi$celltype_manual <- case_when(
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 0 ~ "EB",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 1 ~ "aEC",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 2 ~ "EB",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 3 ~ "mEC",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 4 ~ "EB",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 5 ~ "ISC",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 6 ~ "aEC",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 7 ~ "pEC",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 8 ~ "EB",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 9 ~ "aEC",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 10 ~ "dEC",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 11 ~ "EB",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 12 ~ "EB",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 13 ~ "aEC",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 14 ~ "EB",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 15 ~ "dEC",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 16 ~ "dEC",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 17 ~ "aEC",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 18 ~ "Copper",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 19 ~ "EB",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 20 ~ "aEC", # this one is a bit tricky. also high thetaTry expression. but flyatlas paper says thetaTry is aEC.
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 21 ~ "LFC",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 22 ~ "mEC",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 23 ~ "LFC",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 24 ~ "EE",
  CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 25 ~ "ISC",
  T ~ CphRNAi$integrated_snn_res.1.3
)


CphRNAi$celltype_manual <- factor(CphRNAi$celltype_manual, 
                               levels = c("ISC","EB" ,"dEC","aEC", "Copper", "mEC" , "LFC", "pEC", "EE"))

marker_table$celltype <- factor(marker_table$celltype, 
                                levels = c("ISC", "EB", "dEC" ,"aEC", "Copper" , "mEC" , "LFC", "pEC", "EE", "MT")
)

saveRDS(CphRNAi, here("output", "CphRNAi_seurat_integrated_annotated.rds"))
```
